Sometimes if a terminal application crashes unexpectedly it can leave your terminal in a messed up unusable
state. If this happens, open the Command Palette
and run the "Reset VT" command to reset everything back to a normal state.
Tip: Start a Different Terminal Session
The plus icon in the title bar lets you open a new terminal tab using the default terminal session type.
Did you know that you can select a different session type? Just click on the plus icon with the right mouse
button to choose a different session type.
